name: Emerge: Course on Organic Molecules & Degree of Unsaturation
description: In this course, Mohammad Kashif Alam will cover Organic Molecules & Degree of Unsaturation. All the topics will be discussed in detail and would be helpful for all aspirants preparing for the IIT JEE exam. Learners at any stage of their preparation would be benefited from the course. The course will be taught in Hinglish and notes will be provided in English.

value.title: Orientation of Complete Yearlong Syllabus and BOC (MF, SF, CF & BLF)
Structural Formula, Condensed Formula, Bond Line Formula and Tetra-valency
Drawing and Interconversion of Different Organic Formulae
Classification of Organic Molecules and Degree of Unsaturation
Degree of Unsaturation in Hydrocarbons and in Functional Group Compounds
Degree of Unsaturation in Complex Systems and in Ionic Species

author.bio: A Star faculty of IIT JEE with 11 Best Teaching Awards, Mohammad sir has been an exceptional coach to 6000 AIRs in the last 10+ years.
